content: this lightweight hobo bag is just screaming summer it s giving out all the farmer s market street fair shopping beach-y poolside vibes it s stretchy enough to hold lots of goodies plus it s scrunchable so you can throw it in your purse car wherever this is a beginner-intermediate level knitting pattern all patterns written in standard us terms bag was designed with queensland collection dungarees yarn but most any cotton/cotton blend/linen yarn of the same weight will work
